name: Holiday Heart
description: A drag queen takes in a drug addict and her daughter and helps raise the daughter.

review.author: originalsbyterry-44-687961
review.heading: Ving Rames BEST
review.reviewBody: This is absolutely the very best film that Ving Rames has ever made. His performance was amazing, totally outside of his expected roles. His portrait of a gay drag queen is exquisite. It shows a depth of understanding and empathy which has not been seen is years. His performance is more than deserving of an academy award, not withstandinq that this offering does not qualify for such an award.
